page.title: 07Homelife
page.content: Cats seem to be the most popular pets; one farm thinks it has 38.Dogs are also very common with farms having working ones. Small animals such as rabbits gerbals and hamsters are children's pets.One farm has a steer so tame the children can ride it In Pilning electricity is the commonest fuel for cooking but there are a number using solid fuel. In Over Lane and Knole Park gas is available as it was brought down to supply the brickworks. For speed and convenience microwave ovens are becoming more common. The inhabitants of the area especially amongst themselves have a definite dialect of S.Glos. with an overlay of Bristolian.This leads to adding "L" to the end of any word ending with a vowel.i.e.,bananals for bananas.In one house 3 people have seen a ghost of an old man by a fire.
